Name: Build Lands
About the game: You will have fun and relax building several cute islands, made especially for the game: - Build Lands: In this game mode you will have 20 cute islands, to relax and have fun riding; - Land Editor: Unleash your creativity by building your own “Cute Lands”; - WorkShop: Here you will be able to rate and download the islands made by the community and you will also be able to send your islands so that other players can download them and have fun assembling and evaluating them;; Fun and competition for all ages!
Meta Title: Build Lands: May 20, 2022, Yaw Studios and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Build Lands? Check out the release date (May 20, 2022), developer insights from Yaw Studios, and a complete game summary.
